dev.subtitle: Greyfall Console
dev.title: Developer Notes
dev.helloBody: Greyfall TRPG Console is a browser-based stage and command interface built with React, Zustand, and PixiJS. It synchronises tactical scenes, LLM-assisted prompts, and WebRTC peer sessions for narrative play.
dev.stack.rendering: Rendering: Vite + React 18, PixiJS 7, Tailwind/shadcn styling baseline.
dev.stack.state: State: Zustand stores for session, preferences, and peer sync.
dev.stack.rtc: RTC: Browser-native WebRTC with STUN bootstrap and manual signalling.
dev.stack.ai: AI Assist: WebGPU hooks prepared for local WebLLM integration.
dev.contactBody: Prototype for the Greyfall campaign. For collaboration or feedback, contact the dev collective at {email}.
